Articles.Content: Hello, this is probably a silly question, but if I recall correctly there was a key to reset Warping (instantly turning it off, instead of gradually reducing it), I can't find it anymore. Am I mistaken?

I don't believe there is any key to instantly reduce the time warp to 1x.

Just checked through this key binding sheet and didn't find one.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings

If you click on one of the green triangles of the warp setting display on the upper left, it will jump directly to that warp level. However, the sudden shift can magnify imprecisions in the simulation, wildly throwing your projected course around. It's not advisable. (Or at least that's what used to happen. I haven't tried it for many versions now because of the danger.)
